summary: A short but challenging Nordic Ruin with a fairly powerful weapon as a reward.
descriptionHtml:
1. Description
2. Installation
3. Change Log
4. Known Bugs
5. Future Plans
6. Hints
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Description


This is a short ruin I threw together. It consists of 5 small rooms, many many enemy mages and a challenging boss. 

There is no quest attached to the dungeon at the moment but there is a rather good weapon as a reward. I wasn\'t trying to make it overpowered but I DID want to make it pretty darn good. If it\'s OP, please tell me. There is also an amulet hidden somewhere in the ruin that is well above average but not OP.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2. Installation


A) Extract the archive into your Skyrim folder (should be: C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim)

B) Launch Skyrim via Steam.

C) Click on \"Data Files\".

D) Check off \"Deadly Ruin\" and click \"OK\".

E) Launch the game! Check the screenshots for the location of the dungeon.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

3. Change Log


V 0.5
Initial Release

V 0.6
Added missing lights.

Removed floating objects.

Changed cell ownership.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

4. Known Bugs and Other Issues


Some lights missing.

NPCs attack all at once if detected.

You can see the mountain through the windows to the entrance.

The reward items in the mod are HIGHLY overpowered and one shows up in leveled lists. I\'ve abandoned this mod so none of these issues will be fixed.

I\'m sure there are other issues. Please point them out!!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

5. Future Plans


Hammer out bugs.

Add more detail.

Extend the dungeon by a few rooms. Maybe even a new cell or two.

More unique loot.

Add a quest.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

6. Hints


Out of lockpicks? There\'s a key hidden nearby...
author: Usmovers_02
